title: Haitian roast chicken with two stuffings served with pumpkin rice
ingredients: 3 slices white bread, crusts removed, made into breadcrumbs
2 tsp soft light brown or demerara sugar
2 very ripe plantains, peeled and sliced
2 ripe plum tomatoes, cut into quarters
salt and freshly ground black pepper
450g/1lb basmati rice, rinsed and drained twice to remove excess starch
